text: hal amntm- ya kafaar "mk"- allah aladhi fawq alsama' 'an yakhsif bikum alard, fa'iidha hi tdtrb bikum hataa thlku? hal 'amintum allah aladhi fawq alsama' 'an yursil ealaykum rihana trjmkm bialhijarat alsghyrt, fstelmwn- 'ayuha alkafrwn- kayf tahdhiriun lakum 'iidha eayntm aledhab? wala yanfaeukum aleilm hin dhalik. wafi alayat 'iithbat alelw lilah teala, kama ylyq bjlalh sbhanh
